page.title: 19Social concerns, Craignish.
page.content: The following apply to N.W. of block:- Planning. In a small (but fast grow- ing) community it is not surprising that a watchful eye is kept upon prop- osed new development (most especially the aspects of water supply & increas- use of the roads). Roads.Until 10 years ago the village had a resident 'road-man' who cut the verges and ensured clear and flowing culverts. This is now not the case and altho' a mechanised cutter is sent at intervals it can't replace an intimate knowledge of potential 'trouble spots' Water. E.E.C regulations have meant that our water is now 'chlorine-laced' Dr's Surgery. Regular requests are made to have a (visiting) surgery in the village since at present one has to travel (15 miles) to Lochgilphead to see a Dr.(altho' obviously nurse or Dr. call on the seriously ill).
